content: before first ch2 space double_crochet into each of the skipped dcs in the ch2 space ch2 skipping the 2dcs of the prior color made in row 4a repeated to last ch2 space before spine double_crochet into each of the skipped dcs in the ch2 space ch6 slip_stitch into spine ch2 space ch6 double_crochet into each of the skipped dcs in the next ch2 space ch2 skipping the 2dcs of the prior color made in row 4a double_crochet into each of the skipped dcs in the ch2 space repeated till four double_crochet of the prior color from row 4a remain unworked ch4 slip_stitch into top of last double_crochet in prior color turn row 5 repeat row 3 working into all dcs from row 4a and 4b making sure to capture the ch2s ch6s and ch4 inside the row 5 double crochets repeat row 3 four times the following set of row is then repeated for the rest of the shawl repeat row 4a once repeat row 4b once repeat row 5 once repeat row 3 x times as pictured x equals 6 for third color 4 for the fourth color and twice for the fifth sixth and seventh color with seventh color repeat row 4a once with eighth color repeat row 4b once repeat row 5 once and fasten_off yarn a total of xx row worked weave in ends and block © copyright catrina mackenzie designs 2025 on ravelry com for personal and non-commercial use only 2
